author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two cases of cell phone snatching were reported in New Washermenpet police limits on Sunday night. In separate incidents, Kalaiselvan, a High Court advocate and Anil Sharma — both residents of the area — were robbed by men on speeding motorcycles.

Anil Sharma, who runs a cell phone service centre, was on his way to deliver the phone to a customer, when he was approached by a motorcycle-borne duo around 8:30 pm and the phone was snatched.

Kalaiselvan was walking on Tondiarpet High Road when his phone was snatched by two unknown men. Cases of robbers snatching mobile phones are on the rise, said policemen at New Washermanpet station. “Three days ago, we remanded a suspect on similar charges,” police said, adding investigations were on.
title: Mobile phones snatched in New Washermenpet
